Since they start with an "N" I think it is a YES..... dont see any other place they would fit.... GLWTS Rocky

These cards caught my interest recently.
Nothing wrong with posting here but you might click on the upper right corner and post them in a more appropriate spot. Post both places and increase the eyeballs shopping by. Just saying.... :-)
